name: Ratings
description: Allow users to rate movies, series, and other media with a 1-10 star rating system. Features hover popup showing all user ratings with usernames.
overview: Comprehensive rating plugin with star-based UI, average ratings, and detailed user rating display on hover.

versions.changelog: Improved plugin logo with better visibility and professional design.
Fixed JavaScript injection for rating UI to appear on media pages. Added plugin logo.
Initial release with 1-10 star rating system, hover popup with usernames, rating statistics, and configuration page.
